results.title: Muscular and cardiac manifestations in a Duchenne-carrier harboring a dystrophin deletion of exons 12-29.
results.text_hl: She did not tolerate beta-blockers but profited from @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@. In conclusion, @<m>DISEASE_Neuromuscular_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020879 @@@muscle manifestations@@@ in @DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@DMD@@@-carriers with deletions of exons 12-29 may start years before @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac involvement@@@ becomes clinically apparent.

citations.NLM: Finsterer J, Stöllberger C, Freudenthaler B, Simoni D, Höftberger R, Wagner K. Muscular and cardiac manifestations in a Duchenne-carrier harboring a dystrophin deletion of exons 12-29. Intractable Rare Dis Res. 2018 May;7(2):120-125. PMID: 29862154
